articles.title: 40 Affordable Things Under $20 To Treat Yourself To
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: The Saem is introducing a hydrating eye stick designed to reduce dark circles, lines, and puffiness. Tonymoly launched an octopus-shaped scrub stick for exfoliating skin and removing whiteheads and blackheads. Essence features Lash Princess Mascara to enhance lashes, eliminating the need for extensions.

articles.title: If You're Tired Of Seeing The Same Products Over And Over Again, These 34 New Unexpected Finds Will Make Your Day
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced new products. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in NUDE Honey. Vaseline introduced Golden Hour Glow Body Gel. Dawn reintroduced Frosted Cranberry Dawn Powerwash Spray. McCormick released a limited edition McCormick Finishing Sugar in various flavors. Kuumba Made launched a limited edition Amber Paste perfume rollerball. Olay introduced Wicked hyaluronic serum body washes.

articles.title: Welcome To Zscaler Directory Authentication
articles.summary: The company is currently launching its security service.

articles.title: Shoppers adore thickening spray that gives hair 'the perfect shine and volume'
articles.author: Alice Rush
articles.summary: OUAI has launched the OUAI Thickening Spray, a product designed to provide fuller-looking hair with added volume and density. The spray contains hydrolyzed keratin and biotin and can be applied to damp or dry hair and is available for €29.95 on LookFantastic.ie. LookFantastic also offers the Color Wow Raise the Root Spray for €18.45.

articles.title: DreamCloud's early Black Friday sale has kicked off, and one of our favorite mattresses is 47% off
articles.author: Kinsley Searles
articles.summary: DreamCloud is offering up to 60% off mattresses for Black Friday, including 47% off the Premier Hybrid. All mattress purchases include a free mattress protector, sheet set, and two cooling pillows. Leesa Sapira Hybrid is currently 20% off as part of the brand's early Black Friday sale and Bear Star Hybrid is currently 30% off.

articles.title: Best THC Carts: Top 10 Vapes Best in Potency & Flavor
articles.summary: The article discusses vape cartridges and disposable vapes, highlighting their differences and benefits for consumers. It recommends Area 52 THCA Disposable Vape Pen (2g) for those who are interested in trying it. The article specifies when to select each option based on customer needs.

articles.title: Zelda and Splatoon Amiibo unlocks for Animal Crossing: New Horizons
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: Amiibo can unlock Zelda and Splatoon characters within the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game. This feature introduces new content and enhances the gameplay experience.

articles.title: Taco Bell turns their iconic Baja Blast drink into dessert
articles.author: Christina Cardona
articles.summary: Taco Bell launched a new limited-edition Mountain Dew Baja Blast Pie.

articles.title: Roborock Pawp-Up Brings New Smart Vacuums to SoCal
articles.author: Los Angeles Magazine Partners
articles.summary: Roborock introduces three new vacuum models: the Qrevo CurvX, featuring a slim design and powerful suction; the F25 Ultra, integrating steam and hot water technology; and the Saros Z70, a robotic vacuum with a robotic arm for picking up trash. These products aim to provide advanced cleaning solutions for homes with pets.

articles.title: 31 Things To Make Your Life Seem Put-Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: I Dew Care is offering a dry shampoo powder with a powder-puff applicator. John Frieda provides Secret Weapon Touch Up Creme, a leave-in conditioner for dry hair. Olay sells facial cleaning wipes for removing makeup and waterproof mascara.

articles.title: TOZO NC20 Sets a New Benchmark for Hi-Res Audio and Intelligent Noise Cancellation
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: TOZO is expanding its premium headphone lineup with the upcoming launch of the NC20, next-generation smart earbuds. These earbuds are engineered to deliver studio-grade sound, adaptive noise control, and personalized comfort by combining TOZO's advanced acoustic technology with cutting-edge AI capabilities.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Improved Vanity Mirror (CSK-807)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An inventor has developed the NEW TWIST VANITY MIRROR, a patent-pending vanity mirror designed to offer advantages over existing mirrors by increasing visibility and magnification. The design is adjustable and easy to use, making it suitable for households and hotels, and is currently available for licensing or sale through InventHelp.

articles.title: Expert Insights: Q&A with mycar managing director Sylvain Borré
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: mycar is investing in EV readiness by training technicians and equipping workshops to service electric and hybrid vehicles. They are also focusing on educating drivers about advanced driver-assistance systems to build confidence and increase adoption of these technologies.  mycar aims to bridge the gap between driver hesitancy and technology adoption by offering expertise and reassurance during the transition to EVs.

articles.title: Yangaroo Expands Broadcast Clearance Services in Canada
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: YANGAROO Inc. has launched its Canadian Pre-Clearance services, expanding its broadcast legal clearance and delivery platform across North America. This service enables advertisers and agencies to manage campaign compliance from concept to delivery within a unified YANGAROO platform.

articles.title: Yangaroo Expands Broadcast Clearance Services in Canada
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: YANGAROO Inc. has launched its Canadian Pre-Clearance services, led by Anna Haine, expanding its broadcast legal clearance and delivery platform across North America. This service allows advertisers and agencies to manage campaign compliance from concept to broadcast approval within the YANGAROO platform, providing a more streamlined and efficient process.

articles.title: How Spam became one of the most iconic American brands of all time
articles.author: Ayalla A. Ruvio
articles.summary: Hormel Foods Corporation launched Spam in 1937, which became an iconic American brand. Over the years, Hormel has introduced various Spam products and flavors, including the Spamburger, Spam Lite, Spam Hot and Spicy, Spam with Bacon, Spam Teriyaki, and Spam Jalapeño to adapt to changing consumer preferences and needs; they also launched Spam Spread.

articles.title: Terra Paul Premium Launches ‘Your Daily Dose of Joy!' Through Artisan Coffee, Tea, and Lifestyle Goods
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Terra Paul Premium, an online lifestyle brand, announced its official launch. The brand aims to elevate customers' daily routines and promote contentment.

articles.title: Air Jordan 5 ‘Black Metallic': The Suede Savior of 2025
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Air Jordan is reimagining its Air Jordan 5 'Black Metallic' model. The updated sneaker aims to reignite sneaker culture. The release is scheduled for 2025.

articles.title: rugged phone with a 720P projector, night vision camera, 125W charging and 1TB of storage
articles.summary: 8849 has launched the TANK 4 PRO, a rugged smartphone featuring a 720P projector, night vision camera, 125W charging, and up to 1TB of storage. The phone is designed for extreme conditions and professional use, featuring a 6.73-inch AMOLED screen, MediaTek Dimensity 8300-Ultra chipset, and a massive 11,600mAh battery. It is available on the 8849 website and AliExpress for £589.

articles.title: The Netty Awards Spotlight Top Digital Agencies in Singapore
articles.summary: Neu Entity offers brand strategy, Brand Bible development, social media management, website and SEO optimisation, digital advertising, and photo/video production. Construct Digital delivers enterprise-grade performance and commercial outcomes, deploy strategy, technology, automation, and multi-channel demand generation. Brew Interactive specialises in multi-market demand generation, SEO, content strategy, and integrated paid media.

articles.title: Xpeng G6 update closer to Australia as current model gets special deals
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Xpeng is preparing an updated G6 mid-size electric SUV. Buyers interested in the existing model can currently benefit from special offers.

articles.title: Republic Bank unveils new marketing campaign
articles.author: Hannah Awadzi
articles.summary: Republic Bank (Ghana) PLC has launched its new 'Republic Verse' integrated marketing campaign to improve the banking experience for Ghanaians. The campaign is aligned with the bank's five-year strategic plan and focuses on delivering value through various banking sectors and digitization, inviting customers to explore innovative products and personalized services.

articles.title: Growth Belongs to the Brands That Lean Into Tension
articles.author: Dawn Papandrea
articles.summary: Mattel successfully reinvented its Barbie brand with the release of the Barbie movie in 2023, balancing consistency with reinvention. The movie drove $1.4 billion at the box office, increased Barbie doll sales by 25% in the two months after release, and boosted the brand's growth by 14% that year.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers say this 'magic' $20 cleaning gel gets rid of mould and mildew in your washer. Here's my honest review
articles.author: Sarah Di Muro
articles.summary: Amazon offers a Washing Machine Cleaner Gel priced at $20. This gel removes mold and mildew from washing machines and can also be used on bathroom tiles, bathtubs and sinks.  The product comes in a 5oz bottle with an applicator and gloves, requiring application and waiting for 4-10 hours before wiping it off.

articles.title: How Reliable is leading Northern Ontario's big leap into clean technology
articles.author: Danae Ingram
articles.summary: Reliable Cleaning Services has introduced drone technology, Sherpa by Lucid Bots, for high-access window cleaning. Following this adoption, Reliable developed and launched SkyShine Drone Glass Cleaner, a commercial product specifically designed for drone cleaning, now available for purchase. This highlights Reliable's commitment to integrating innovation and tradition within their business.

articles.title: Spotlight: How Reliable is leading Northern Ontario's big leap into clean technology
articles.author: Danae Ingram
articles.summary: Reliable Cleaning Services introduced drone technology for high-access window cleaning using the Sherpa drone system by Lucid Bots. To address finish issues encountered with drone cleaning, Reliable developed and launched SkyShine Drone Glass Cleaner, a commercial product made by their Reliable Maintenance Products division specifically for drone cleaning.

articles.title: Alao renews comparison platform for mobile phone and internet subscriptions
articles.summary: Alao, a mobile subscription comparison platform, has launched a revamped website with new features, including real-world network testing, detailed subscription comparisons, AI-powered assistance, and a smart ranking system. The platform also streamlines the ordering and switching process, including automatic contract termination and number porting. The company has also deepened its collaboration with Twint, a Swiss mobile payment app, to allow users to take out new subscriptions directly within the app.

articles.title: The 2025 GQ Limited-Edition Fragrance Box Smells Freakin' Phenomenal
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: GQ is launching the Limited-Edition Fragrance Box for 2025, a curated collection of fragrances and olfactory delights. Subscribers can purchase the box, valued at $233, for $79 as part of the quarterly GQ Box subscription service.

articles.title: GOAL launches new Telegram tipping service – smarter football insights, delivered direct to your phone
articles.author: Goal
articles.summary: GOAL has launched a new Telegram tipping service.

articles.title: Don't settle for ‘meh' cleaning — buy the Shark AI vacuum at 50% off today
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a 50% discount on the Shark AI Ultra Voice Control Robot Vacuum. This smart-cleaning device features 360-degree LiDAR mapping, precision grid scrubbing, voice control, self-cleaning brushroll, and self-emptying capabilities for up to 60 days. The vacuum is designed for effective dust removal and can be controlled via an app with a programmable cleaning schedule.

articles.title: Pocket Dispo Pro Lens Repurposes Disposable Film Camera Optics
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Pocket Dispo has launched a new 'Pro' version of its pinhole lens.

articles.title: Next wave of growth will come from smaller towns, say India Inc entrepreneurs
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Swiggy is expanding beyond food delivery into groceries, ticketing, and travel to become an 'operating system for daily life.' Lenskart utilizes AI-powered self-testing devices to overcome optometrist shortages. Urban Company provides consistent doorstep services in home cleaning, beauty, and repairs. PolicyBazaar Fintech sells health and term insurance policies to cater to the growing demand in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities.

articles.title: All I want for Christmas is big, shiny hair — and this Drybar kit
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: Drybar introduces the "You Had Me at Blowout Kit", designed for at-home blowouts, featuring the Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush and other products like Prep Rally Prime & Prep Detangler, Detox Dry Shampoo, Triple Sec 3-in-1 Finishing Spray, and Final Call Frizz & Static Control Mist. The kit provides a comprehensive hair routine, packaged attractively, and offers a salon-quality experience. The retail value of the kit is $240.

articles.title: Highly Anticipated Sunnyside Pasta Shop Opens This Weekend
articles.author: Molly Martin
articles.summary: Boombots, a new pasta shop from the owners of Odie B's, is set to debut on November 8th. The menu includes pasta dishes, small plates, and desserts, with unique offerings like Dirty Martini Bucatini and Big Ass Mozz Stix. The restaurant's design and branding were created by Regular Architecture and Paper Laundry, respectively.

articles.title: ‘Absolutely gorgeous' say shoppers over Marks & Spencer's ‘quality' mini dress in 2 shades for Christmas parties at €65
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer has launched a new Organza Puff Sleeve Mini Shift Dress priced at €65. The dress is available in black and red, sizes 6 to 24, and in petite, regular, and tall lengths. It features a square neckline, puffy short sleeves, and a fitted waist.

articles.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
articles.author: Tech Crunch
articles.summary: Amazon launched Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination for Asia, Africa, and Latin America.

articles.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping app targeted at markets in Asia, Africa, and Latin America. The app features affordable products under $10 and offers features such as customer reviews, free returns within 15 days, and multilingual customer support.

articles.title: 'Good quality and gorgeous' Marks and Spencer dress is perfect for party season
articles.author: Aine Kenny
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is offering the Organza Puff Sleeve Mini Shift Dress, available in sizes 6-24 and colors black and red. The dress, priced at €65, features organza puff sleeves and comes in petite, regular, and tall lengths. Customers have provided feedback on the dress's fit and style for party season.

articles.title: Amazon takes low-cost ecommerce service global
articles.author: Arriana McLymore
articles.summary: Amazon expanded its low-cost e-commerce service Amazon Bazaar to 14 new markets. This expansion competes with rivals Shein and Temu by offering ultra-cheap goods. Amazon Bazaar delivers products, most under $10, from its global fulfillment centers.

articles.title: Achieve Salon-Quality Hair at Home with This Affordable Styling Brush
articles.author: njdotcom
articles.summary: A lightweight hair styling brush featuring rapid heating and negative ion technology is now available on Amazon for a limited time at a discounted price of $50 (originally $70). Designed for busy mornings and dry hair touch-ups, it offers a sleek, polished finish and is suitable for various hair types.

articles.title: Your TV is missing one thing – smell!
articles.author: CGTN
articles.summary: Scent TV, featuring AI and digital olfactory technology, has been unveiled. It utilizes a "scent host" device to release odors corresponding to on-screen video content in real-time, enhancing entertainment experiences. The device was displayed at CIIE's China pavilion.

articles.title: Pond's Launches Limited-Edition 3-Pack of Fresh Hydration Gel Moisturizer at Costco Canada
articles.author: func.media
articles.summary: Pond's has launched a limited-edition 3-pack of its Fresh Hydration Gel Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid, exclusively available at select Costco locations in Canada. This bundle offers increased quantity of the moisturizer, known for providing 24-hour hydration and luminous skin through a combination of hyaluronic acid, vitamin E, and vitamin B3.

articles.title: This midrange Lenovo laptop has no business being this good for the price
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo's IdeaPad 5i provides significant value for its cost. However, specific design choices might be detrimental for certain users.

articles.title: The 3-Ingredient Canned Oyster Snack That's Endlessly Customizable
articles.author: Andy Hume
articles.summary: Nice Cans, a tinned seafood brand, suggests enjoying their smoked oysters on Melba toasts with cream cheese. The company's CEO, Charlotte Langley, recommends various accompaniments such as lemon zest, capers, fresh dill, and horseradish for creating customizable canned oyster snacks. Langley also suggests using soft, tangy cheeses like goat cheese or whipped feta to contrast the oyster's richness.

articles.title: Dry shampoo made shoppers hair go 'from oily to fresh looking in a minute'
articles.author: Bethan Shufflebotham
articles.summary: Color Wow has launched its Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, designed to clean hair like a real shampoo with Active Cleansing Technology that eliminates up to 95% of sebum. The formula, priced at £26.50, uses a shampoo-grade cleanser that breaks down dirt into micro-droplets and promises virtually no residue, aiming to leave hair feeling freshly washed.

articles.title: Dry shampoo made shoppers hair go 'from oily to fresh in a minute'
articles.author: Laura Mckenna
articles.summary: Color Wow has launched Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, a new dry shampoo featuring Active Cleansing Technology to eliminate sebum. The formula, priced at £26.50, cleans like a shampoo, promises virtually no residue, and normalizes sebum production. User reviews are largely positive, praising its lack of white cast and refreshing effect.

articles.title: 33 Things That'll Make It Look You Got A Home Reno
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: SnapPower is offering GuideLights that replace the need for plug-in night-lights. Also Listed are NoNo Brackets that allow users to install curtains without drilling and a renter-friendly Tulip shade to cover ceiling lights, all targeting easy installation and use without permanent alterations. A magnetic dishwasher cover will help you transform that magical appliance as a design focal point.

articles.title: Punchcut Appoints Akshat Srivastava Director of Design Engineering
articles.author: Punchcut
articles.summary: Punchcut expands its AI Prototyping & Development practice to assist companies in creating AI-driven product experiences. The expanded practice focuses on agentic AI and aims to design collaborative experiences between users, AI agents, and connected services. This new initiative is intended to provide advanced and deeply human solutions for business advantage through prototypes and launches.

articles.title: MANZI Water Expands Access To Safe, Clean Drinking Water With New Outlets Opening Across South Africa
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: MANZI Water is expanding with the launch of new outlets across South Africa, including locations in Sandton, Taung, Mossel Bay, Bronkhorstspruit, Diepsloot, and Bushbuckridge.  The company is also introducing new environmentally friendly water refill stations in strategic locations to provide convenient access to quality water.

articles.title: The best new electric driver's car?
articles.summary: Hyundai introduces the Ioniq 6 N, a new performance EV and follow-up to the Ioniq 5 N. The Ioniq 6 N features four-wheel drive, 641bhp, a wider track, and aerodynamic design improvements.

articles.title: The Best New Electric Driver's Car?
articles.summary: Hyundai launched the Ioniq 6 N, a new performance EV. The Ioniq 6 N features four-wheel drive and 641bhp, and is lower, longer, and sleeker than the regular Ioniq.

articles.title: The Grocer's New Product & Packaging Awards 2025: Cheese
articles.author: Megan Tatum
articles.summary: Leerdammer launched its first spreadable cheese, Leerdammer Original Spreadable, targeting adults with a premium product that retains the brand's mild, nutty flavor. The product features a convenient spreadable format and eye-catching branding.

articles.title: Samsung Wants To Rival Chrome With Its AI-Powered Internet Browser On Windows PCs
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its Internet browser, previously limited to Galaxy smartphones, for Windows users in the US and South Korea as part of its beta program. The Windows app for Samsung Internet includes AI features and supports extensions, dark mode, and Samsung account cross-device syncing, aiming to provide an alternative to Chrome. Samsung plans to offer wide range of AI features with the browser and make its presence felt.

articles.title: Are foldable phones worth buying? Likely not, but if you are getting one make it Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 10 Pro Fold is highlighted for its exceptional displays, clean Android software integrated with Gemini AI, and overall user experience. Despite storage limitations, it's recommended for its features like display quality and software, including a free one-year Gemini Pro subscription.

articles.title: Gachwala Introduces Button Mushroom Seeds to Boost India's Mushroom Farming Sector
articles.summary: Gachwala has launched its Sylvan A15 Button Mushroom Seeds in India, designed to enhance yield, quality, and profitability for farmers. This new product features faster colonization, higher yield (30-35% increase), contamination resistance, climate adaptability, and sustainability. The Sylvan A15 Button Mushroom Seeds are available for order across India through gachwala.in.

articles.title: T's Linen Service - North Haven, CT Patch
articles.summary: T's offers a new linen service for businesses like restaurants, hotels, and spas. This service handles laundry, inventory, and delivery, allowing businesses to focus on their core operations while saving money and supporting the environment.

articles.title: Amazon Extends Haul's Ultra Low-Price Shopping Experience To Nigeria With New Amazon Bazaar App
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: Amazon launched the Amazon Bazaar app in Nigeria and 14 other locations, providing affordable products across fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. The app offers features like social lucky draws, promotions, local currency options, and free delivery for orders reaching NGN30,000.

articles.title: 52 Thing To Help You Be Cleaner And More Organized
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new cleaning and organizing products, including the Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, Rubbermaid Brilliance containers, and Dawn Powerwash dish soap, designed to simplify household tasks. Also included are specialized cleaners like Rocco & Roxie's odor-eliminating spray and Bioclean hard water stain remover, as well as products like Shelf dividers, a Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum, and glass jars with bamboo lids, all to improve the consumer's cleaning and organizing experience.

articles.title: This $30 gadget keeps my office and workspace organized at all times
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Nelko introduced the Nelko label maker, a miniature workhorse that utilizes an app for smartphone or laptop use.

articles.title: Amazon launches Kindle Translate, allowing KDP authors to publish AI-translated books
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Amazon launched Kindle Translate, an AI-powered translation service for authors using Kindle Direct Publishing. Initially, it supports translations between English and Spanish and from German to English, with plans to add more languages. The service is currently offered for free and integrates with KDP Select and Kindle Unlimited.

articles.title: Gen Z Leadership: Understand Their "Why" & Inspire Action
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Nike is shifting its marketing strategy from 'Just Do It' to 'Why Do It?' to resonate with Gen Z's demand for purpose and authenticity. This change represents a fundamental shift in how the company approaches its messaging and brand identity, emphasizing the 'why' behind its products and actions to connect with a generation seeking meaningful work and purpose-driven organizations.

articles.title: Shoppers are rushing to M&S after spotting cosy pyjama sets – & the price is cheaper than Primark's version
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new nightwear line featuring pure cotton pyjama sets priced at £12.50. The new PJs are available in a range of prints in sizes XS to XXL and have received positive reviews for their comfort, quality, and affordability.

articles.title: BYD Electrifies The Weekend With Mega Electric Day Deals
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: BYD will host its Mega Electric Day on November 8, 2025, offering South African consumers a sneak peek at the new Sealion 5 plug-in hybrid SUV, launching later in November. The event will feature test drives and special offers on BYD's electric vehicles, including discounts up to R30,000 on selected models ordered on the day. The Sealion 5 combines long-range plug-in-hybrid capability with family-focused features and reflects BYD's vision for accessible and functional technology.

articles.title: How Choosing Right Detergent Helps Your Clothes Stay Clean & Last Longer
articles.author: Sapna Sarfare
articles.summary: Patanjali introduces a range of new detergent products, including Patanjali Herbo Wash Advance Matic Detergent Powder, Patanjali Herbal Wash Detergent Powder, Patanjali Somya Liquid Detergent, and Patanjali Herbal Wash Detergent Cake. These detergents offer various benefits such as stain removal, fabric protection, and eco-friendly ingredients, catering to different washing needs and preferences.

articles.title: Young founders are trying to revive Vancouver's dying startup scene
articles.author: Aleksandra Sagan
articles.summary: Claymor, an AI-powered medical billing software provider, is highlighted in the article. Parmar, the co-founder of Claymor, is working on a $5 million fundraise, connecting with someone he met at a Red Thread Club event. Parmar is also working out the details of a move to San Francisco for himself and his company.

articles.title: 'Great little device' helping Amazon shoppers dry clothes inside
articles.author: Katie Timms Head
articles.summary: Amazon is selling the Honeywell 12L/Day Dehumidifier for £132.99, featuring clothes drying mode and auto functions. Robert Dyas offers the Daewoo 12L Digital Dehumidifier for £79.99, while Dunelm provides its 12L Electric Dehumidifier for £120 with features like a timer and child safety lock.

articles.title: Dyson hair dryer cut by £100 in exclusive Black Friday deal
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Dyson is offering its Supersonic Nural hair dryer at a discounted price of £299.99 for Black Friday. The hair dryer features a 'scalp protect mode' and auto-adapts to enhance natural shine and protect scalp health. Customer reviews praise its performance, quick drying time, and innovative technology.

articles.title: I tried Taco Bell's Mountain Dew Baja Blast pie. I can see — and taste — who the fast food restaurant is targeting.
articles.author: Katie Notopoulos
articles.summary: Taco Bell launched a Mountain Dew Baja Blast-flavored frozen pie targeted towards Gen Z customers. The pie, priced at $19.99, is available for a limited time and intended for sharing. This launch aligns with Taco Bell's strategy to attract younger customers through novelty items and beverage-related products, as well as Taco Bell launching Live Más Cafes which feature specialty beverage items like blended iced drinks.

articles.title: Village Park's Iconic Nasi Lemak Sambal Is Now Available In Singapore
articles.author: Tamara Jayne
articles.summary: Village Park's Nasi Lemak Sambal is now available at FairPrice Finest stores in Singapore. The sambal, known for its spicy flavor, comes in Original and Lagi Pedas (extra spicy) versions, priced at SGD6.95 (RM22) per 225g jar with an introductory promotion of SGD6.50 (RM20) until November 30. FairPrice Finest shoppers will also receive a free Village Park mug with every purchase until November 9, while supplies last.

articles.title: Next launches new £36 jumper in three colours that's perfect for chilly autumn days
articles.author: Sam Dimmer
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new Chunky Knit Stand Neck Jumper, available in three colours and priced at £36. The jumper is made from a blend of recycled polyester, acrylic, nylon and wool and is available in sizes XS to 2XL. Marks and Spencer offers a Chunky Pointelle Crew Neck Jumper with Wool priced at £40, available in two shades, and Boden has a Natalie Embroidered Jumper adorned with bows, available in three colours and priced at £129.

articles.title: Next's new £36 jumper comes in 'lovely autumn colours to lift your spirit'
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new product, the Chunky Knit Stand Neck Jumper, available in three colors. Priced at £36, the jumper comes in sizes XS to 2XL and is made from a blend of recycled polyester, acrylic, nylon, and wool.

articles.title: Morning Fresh and Naivas Honour Everyday Shoppers in 'Everyday Fresh Deals' Campaign Grand Finale
articles.author: Jenna Ortega
articles.summary: Morning Fresh and Naivas Supermarket launched "Every Fresh Deals," a campaign rewarding consumers through offers, activations, and giveaways. PZ Cussons, Morning Fresh's parent company, collaborated with Naivas and Ramtons to enhance the shopping experience and reward loyalty.

articles.title: This Lenovo 2-in-1 is a winner at this price point, even if it's not for me
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo's IdeaPad 5i provides significant value but design limitations might be a drawback for some users. The product is being reviewed based on its features and overall offering.

articles.title: Olight to Unveil Its New Flagship Flashlight Series: A powerful combination of innovation, technology and fashion
articles.author: Vietnam News
articles.summary: Olight, a portable lighting innovator, will unveil its new flagship flashlight series. This series combines innovation, technology, and fashion.

articles.title: Coke Buddy Revolutionizes India's Kirana Stores with AI-Driven Efficiency
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Coca-Cola India launched Coke Buddy, an AI-enabled platform, to transform kirana store operations. The platform simplifies inventory management, provides real-time notifications on promotions and new launches, and offers AI-backed suggestions to enhance business growth for over 10 lakh retailers.

articles.title: Olight to Unveil Its New Flagship Flashlight Series: A powerful combination of innovation, technology and fashion
articles.author: Zawya
articles.summary: Olight is unveiling a new flagship flashlight series. The series combines innovation, technology, and fashion.

articles.title: Coke Buddy Turns India's Corner Stores into Smart Retail Hubs
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Coca-Cola India has scaled up Coke Buddy, an AI-enabled digital platform designed for retailers. Coke Buddy allows shopkeepers to order anytime, track deliveries, and access real-time pricing and promotions and also recommends products based on past buying patterns and seasonal demand.

articles.title: Amazon Introduces Kindle Translate: AI-Powered Service Will Boost Kindle Direct Publishing Authors To Reach Global Readers
articles.author: Deepak Gharai
articles.summary: Amazon has launched a beta version of 'Kindle Translate', an AI-powered translation tool for KDP authors, aimed at simplifying eBook translation into multiple languages. The service enables authors to translate from English to Spanish, as well as from German to English. OPPO also announced the launch date for OPPO Find X9 and OPPO Find X9 Pro in India on November 18, and Realme GT8 Pro Launch Date in India on November 20.

articles.title: Suonon Vapes: The Complete Guide to All Suonon Flavors (2025 Edition)
articles.author: WB News
articles.summary: Suonon Vapes is disrupting the vape industry with its smooth devices, bold flavors, and satisfying vaping experience. The brand specializes in disposable vapes with consistent taste, strong puff, and a smooth design and offers a variety of nicotine content and a wide range of flavors, including Blue Razz Ice, Watermelon Bubblegum, and Strawberry Banana.

articles.title: AliExpress stages 11-second shopping challenge in Seoul pop-up
articles.author: Choi Hyo-Jung
articles.summary: AliExpress launched the '11-second shopping cart challenge' pop-up store in Seoul and piloted the 'AliFresh' service in partnership with Gmarket. These initiatives are part of AliExpress's strategy to strengthen its presence in the Korean market and broaden contact points with local consumers.

articles.title: Woolies blinks, hikes on-demand delivery fee by 29%
articles.author: Hilton Tarrant
articles.summary: Woolworths will increase the delivery fee for Woolies Dash to R45 from November 10th. Checkers' Sixty60 saw sales growth of 47.7% in the year to end June, and it added a general merchandise category from its Checkers Hyper footprint in October 2024. It also launched a subscription plan, called XtraSavings Plus, where customers get unlimited deliveries (for orders over R350) for R99 per month.

articles.title: Canon launches versatile EOS R6 Mark III and innovative RF 45mm F1.2 STM lens, expanding creative possibilities for visual storytellers
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Canon has unveiled a dual release, indicating the launch of new products or services.

articles.title: Fast Lane: Launch of Audi A6 e-tron, Honda Step Wgn and Leapmotor C10
articles.author: Lee Nian Tjoe
articles.summary: Audi has launched the A6 Sportback e-tron, its first electric A6, in Singapore. Honda's agent, Kah Motor, has launched the Step Wgn, a 2-litre petrol-hybrid multi-seater. Leapmotor debuted in Singapore with the C10, an electric SUV.

articles.title: Realme GT8 Pro Launch Date in India Confirmed on November 20; Check Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Realme is launching the Realme GT8 Pro in India on November 20. The GT8 Pro features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a Hyper Vision AI Chip, a 2K display, a 7,000mAh battery, and runs on realme UI 7.0. The smartphone will be available in Dairy White and Urban Blue color options and has Ricoh GR camera technology.

articles.title: GigaCloud Technology Inc (GCT) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Record Revenue and Strategic ...
articles.author: Guru Focus News
articles.summary: GigaCloud Technology Inc plans to acquire New Classic to diversify its business and expand beyond e-commerce into brick-and-mortar wholesale. The company is focusing on concluding the acquisition of New Classic. GigaCloud Technology continuously looks for opportunities that can bring more products or enhance fulfillment capabilities.

articles.title: transcosmos wins Golden Headset Digital Services Benchmarking Company of the Year Top 10 in China
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: transcosmos was awarded the 2025 Golden Headset Digital Services Benchmarking Company of the Year Top 10 for its digital intelligence solutions. transcosmos offers transCxLink, transpeech, trans-AI Chat, and trans-Marketing BI, leveraging its AICC (AI Contact Center) to optimize costs and streamline operations.

articles.title: Blending Tradition with Modernity: Mother Sparsh's Innovative Approach
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Mother Sparsh is adapting traditional Indian remedies into modern baby care products. The product lineup features items like the Tummy Roll-On, Baby Wipes, After Bite Turmeric Balm, Talc-Free Natural Dusting Powder and Natural Baby Massage Oil, all designed to offer convenient and effective solutions for modern parents based on age-old practices.

articles.title: Coke Releasing New Soda Flavor That's Been Around Since Early 1900s
articles.author: Rob Carroll
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is planning to introduce a new flavor in 2025. This move is part of the company's strategy to compete for store shelf space amid competition among soda companies. The new flavor leverages an iconic profile to attract more consumers.

articles.title: NH Nonghyup Bank celebrates the 25th anniversary of non-face-to-face deposits...launches 'NH Daebak 7 Savings' with up to 7.1% per annum
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: NH Nonghyup Bank launched the 'NH Daebak 7 Savings' account on December 12th, offering a 7.1% annual interest rate to customers who meet specific criteria, including being new to the bank or demonstrating salary performance. The bank is also running the 'Lucky 777 Event' to celebrate the launch, giving 777 customers the opportunity to win prizes.

articles.title: Isuzu at the Japan Mobility Expo 2025 (Isuzu Australia Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Isuzu has launched a new range of trucks featuring a sleek new cab design. The new range incorporates more advanced safety features. It also provides a smoother and more comfortable driving experience.

articles.title: I add tumble dryer balls to my appliance for quicker drying—they're incredible
articles.author: Sophie Harris
articles.summary: Tumble dryer balls, sold at The Range for £1, reduce drying time, soften clothes, reduce static, and prevent clumping by improving airflow in the dryer. Users can add one to three balls into the dryer along with wet laundry for faster drying and less creased clothes, especially effective on bedding and towels. The user has experienced a huge difference when using the drying balls.

articles.title: Social Media Goes Wild Over RM0.00 Guardian X GrabMart 'Offer' – Was It Promo Or Glitch?
articles.author: Shahril Bahrom
articles.summary: Guardian and Zus Coffee experienced incidents where their products were mistakenly priced at RM0.00 on the Grab app. Grab users quickly took advantage of the pricing error. Zus Coffee products, including coffee and combo sets, were sold for significantly reduced prices during the incident.

articles.title: ‘Talk about itchy': Aussie pyjama brand savaged for design choice
articles.author: Lauren Robinson
articles.summary: Peter Alexander launched a new sequin-covered pyjama set, which has received mixed reactions from shoppers, with some questioning its practicality. The brand previously faced criticism for using AI-generated posters featuring distorted images, indicating a shift in design approach and marketing strategies.

articles.title: Flipkart introduces Ray-Ban Meta glasses combining style and technology
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Flipkart is launching Ray-Ban Meta Smart Glasses on its platform on November 21, 2025. These AI-powered glasses, a collaboration with Meta, offer hands-free connectivity, content capture, and access to information via voice commands and integrate seamlessly with Instagram and Facebook, providing a new wearable technology experience for Indian consumers.

articles.title: Johnson's Baby unveils new branding, formulas, and sustainable packaging
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Johnson's Baby has launched an upgraded range of baby care products featuring advanced skin-science based formulations and sustainable packaging, targeting the needs of modern parents. The company also unveiled its 'It's Pure Love' campaign, highlighting the importance of bonding moments between parents and their babies. The new product range includes gentle formulations with natural ingredients, enhanced moisturizing capabilities, and packaging made with 50% Post-Consumer Recycled (PCR) plastic.

articles.title: Xencelabs Launches Ultra-Portable 4K OLED Pen Display 16 Lite​
articles.author: Vietnam News
articles.summary: Xencelabs announced the launch of Pen Display 16 Lite. The Pen Display 16 Lite is a new ultra-portable 4K OLED pen display designed for mobile use.

articles.title: HalalStreet.co.uk Unveils Affordable ‘Global Listing Program', Paving the Way for Small & Micro Halal Players
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: HalalStreetUK launched its Global Listing Program (GLP) in Malaysia on November 7, 2025. The GLP provides affordable, AI-enhanced tools to small Halal businesses to facilitate global export, including digital storefronts, logistic support, and mentorship. The program aims to simplify international trade and enable merchants to communicate in real-time and close deals in multiple languages.

articles.title: HalalStreet.co.uk Unveils Affordable ‘Global Listing Program', Paving the Way for Small & Micro Halal Players
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: HalalStreetUK launched its Global Listing Program (GLP) in Malaysia on November 7, 2025. The GLP is an affordable, AI-enhanced service designed to simplify global exports for small Halal businesses. The program provides digital storefronts, logistical support, mentorship, and AI-powered translation tools to facilitate international trade.

articles.title: HalalStreet.co.uk Unveils Affordable ‘Global Listing Program', Paving the Way for Small & Micro Halal Players
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: HalalStreetUK launched its Global Listing Program (GLP) in Malaysia to support small Halal businesses in global export. The GLP offers AI-enhanced digital storefronts, logistic support, and mentorship. This program aims to simplify international trade for SMEs in the Halal and Muslim products sector, enabling them to access global markets.

articles.title: The new creative destruction
articles.author: Mirza M Hamza
articles.summary: Nike released an AI-generated film featuring Serena Williams. Kalshi aired an AI-created NBA Finals ad for under $2,000, highlighting the emergence of AI in content creation and advertising, thus demonstrating companies are launching new products/services using the latest AI technology.

articles.title: Lotte Chemical starts operation of new Indonesian petrochemical plant
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Lotte Chemical Corp. launched a new petrochemical product.

articles.title: Tineco Introduces the Next Generation of Cordless Cleaning with the All-New PURE ONE A90S
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tineco launched the PURE ONE A90S, a new cordless vacuum cleaner. The A90S, showcased at IFA, combines performance, adaptability, and design for smart cleaning.

articles.title: Sri Lanka launches National Industry Information System
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
org: Ministry of Industry and Entrepreneurship Development
articles.summary: Sri Lanka's Ministry of Industry and Entrepreneurship Development has launched the National Industry Information System (NIIS), a new digital platform. NIIS consolidates and manages all information related to the country's industrial and economic activities, serving as a centralized database encompassing industry details, business classifications, legal status, and other relevant data. Verified entities will receive an official certificate recognizing it as a registered industry within the National Industry Database.

articles.title: TAICEND's Patented Fish Collagen Technology Brings a Breakthrough in the Healing of Hard-to-Heal Wounds
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TAICEND will launch its new product, TAICEND Collagen Dressing, in 2026. The dressing is extracted from premium fish skin and produced using a patented low-temperature extraction technology and proprietary formulation.

articles.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
articles.author: Crunch
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination. This service targets customers in Asia, Africa, and Latin America. Amazon Bazaar will be available separately from the main Amazon shopping app.

articles.title: Pond's Launches Limited-Edition 3-Pack of Fresh Hydration Gel Moisturizer at Costco Canada
articles.author: Canada Newswire
articles.summary: Pond's introduced a limited-edition 3-pack of its Fresh Hydration Gel Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid. The exclusive bundle is now available at select Costco warehouses across Canada.
